arts.ttl: Atletico deny Barcelona in thriller while Arminia Bielefeld stun Werder Bremen
arts.sum: Cannes also sprung an upset on an evening of cup action around Europe.

arts.ttl: Third-tier Arminia Bielefeld reaches German Cup semifinals with 2-1 win over Werder Bremen
arts.sum: Third-division team Arminia Bielefeld reached the semifinals of the German Cup on Tuesday by upsetting Bundesliga side Werder Bremen 2-1 in their quarterfinal. The unfortunate Malatini scored an own goal six minutes later when he tried stopping Stefano Russo’s cross only to deflect the ball over and into the net.

arts.ttl: Giant-killing continues as Bielefeld roll past Bremen into Pokal final-four
arts.sum: Arminia Bielefeld upset the apple cart yet again by dumping Werder Bremen out of the DfB Pokal on a 2-1 scoreline.

arts.ttl: Arminia Bielefeld vs Werder Bremen DFB Pokal quarterfinal preview: Can Bielefeld keep their cup dream alive?
arts.sum: Will it be Bielefeld or Bremen who advance to the semifinal of the German Cup?

arts.ttl: Arminia Bielefeld vs. Werder Bremen: DFB Cup quarter-final probable teams, match stats and LIVE blog!
arts.sum: Arminia Bielefeld host Werder Bremen in their DFB Cup quarter-final tie on Tuesday as the two teams aim to keep their hopes of glory alive (kick-off: 8.45pm CET). Liga club to eliminate four Bundesliga teams in a single cup run, after Energie Cottbus (1996/97), Bielefeld themselves in 2014/15 and Saarbrücken last season.

arts.ttl: Preview: Arminia Bielefeld vs. Werder Bremen - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Tuesday's DFB-Pokal clash between Arminia Bielefeld and Werder Bremen, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
